instructions: Mix yeast and flour well together, gradually add water and milk while mixing. Add an egg, salt and sugar when well mixed and make a dough. Cut the cooled butter into thin pieces, place them between two sheets of parchment paper and roll a thin rectangular sheet. Place the butter layer onto rectangular rolled out dough and fold them together in half and roll it out thinly again. Cut the dough in many long triangles. Roll each triangle starting from the wider side. Grease the croissant with beaten egg yolk and bake in the oven at 400 degrees 20 minutes!
name: Classic Croissant
description: Crispy, full of puff pastry, smells like butter from the inside...
ingredients: Active dry yeast - 1 tsp, flour - 1/2 cup, milk - 2/3 cup, water - 1/4 cup, 1 egg, salt - 1 tsp, sugar - 5 tbsp, butter - 1 cup

instructions: Dissolve yeast in warm milk in a large bowl and let it react for about 5 minutes. Mix in sugar, butter, salt, eggs, and flour. Knead dough into a large ball. Cover tightly with plastic wrap. Let rise in a warm place about 1 hour or until dough has doubled in size. In a small bowl, combine brown sugar and cinnamon. Roll dough into a 16x21 inch rectangle about 1/4 inch thick. Spread dough with 1/3 cup softened butter and sprinkle evenly with sugar/cinnamon mixture. Roll up dough starting with the longer side and cut into 12 large rolls. Place rolls in a glass baking dish. Cover and let rise until nearly doubled. Meanwhile, preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake rolls in preheated oven until golden brown, about 18-20 minutes. While rolls are baking, beat together cream cheese, butter, confectioners' sugar, vanilla extract and salt. Spread half the frosting on them while they are still warm so that the frosting melts into the roll and the other half after they've sat for a couple of minutes.
name: Cinnabon
description: Delicious dough rolled with cinnabon and butter, topped with butter cream
ingredients: milk - 1 cup, active dry yeast - 1 package, sugar - 1/2 cup, melted butter - 1/3 cup, salt - 1 tsp, 2 eggs, flour - 4 1/2 cups, brown sugar - 1 cup, ground cinnamon - 2 1/2 tbsp, unsalted butter - 1/3 cup, cream cheese - 8 oz, unsalted butter - 1/2 cup, confectioners' sugar - 3 cups, vanilla extract - 1 tsp, salt - 1/8 tsp

instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Make the cake: Whisk the flour, baking soda, cocoa powder, and salt together in a large bowl. Set aside. Beat the butter and sugar together until combined. Add the oil, egg yolks, vanilla extract, and vinegar. (Set the egg whites aside.) Add the dry ingredients in 2-3 additions alternating with the buttermilk. Add desired amount of food coloring. Vigorously whisk or beat meringue out of the 4 egg whites. Gently fold into cake batter. Divide the mixture into 2 baking pans. Bake for 30-32 minutes. Remove cakes from the oven and cool completely in the pans. The cakes must be completely cool before frosting and assembling.Make the frosting: In a large bowl beat the cream cheese and butter together. Add the confectioners’ sugar, milk, and vanilla extract. Frosting should be soft, but not runny. Assemble and frost: Using a large serrated knife, slice a thin layer off the tops of the cakes to create a flat surface. Discard or crumble over finished cake. Evenly cover the cake layer with frosting. Top with 2nd layer and spread remaining frosting all over the top and sides. Refrigerate cake for at least 30-60 minutes before slicing.
name: Red Velvet Cake
description: Soft, moist and buttery red cake with cream cheese frosting
ingredients: Flour - 3 cups, baking soda - 1 tsp, cocoa powder - 2 tbsp, salt - 1/2 tsp, unsalted softened butter - 1/2 cup, sugar - 2 cups, oil - 1 cup, 4 eggs, vanilla extract - 1 tbsp, white vinegar - 1 tsp, liquid or gel red food coloring, buttermilk - 1 cup, cream cheese - 16 ounces,  unsalted butter - 1/2 cup, confectioners’ sugar - 4 and 1/2 cups, milk - 1 tbsp, vanilla extract - 1 and 1/2 tsp

instructions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees, prepare a tray covered with parchment paper. Mix the cornstarch, vanilla and vinegar together in a small bowl, until smooth; set aside. Whisk the egg whites in a clean, dry bowl until stiff,  then whisk in a little sugar, and a little of the cornstarch paste, and continue adding until they are completely mixed in. Spoon the egg white mixture into a tray and smooth it out. Bake for 25 minutes. Turn the meringue over to the towel placed on the counter. Beat the cream with sugar, spread the cream on the meringue, top with berries, and roll in roulade. Leave overnight.
name: Summer Meringue Roulade
description: Crunchy, fluffy meringue roulade filled with cream and berries
ingredients: Corn starch - 1 tsp , vanilla extract - 1 tsp, white vinegar - 1 tsp, 4 egg whites, sugar - 2/3 cup, heavy whipping cream - 1 cup, raspberries - 1/2 cup, chopped strawberries -  1/2 cup, confectioner’s sugar.

instructions: Preheat oven to 375 dergrees and line 18 muffin cups with cupcake liners. In large bowl, whisk together oil, sugar, and milk. Stir in eggs and vanilla until well-combined. Gently fold in sour cream. In separate, medium-sized bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt. Combine flour mixture and wet mixture, stir in 1 1/2 cup chocolate chips. Scoop chocolate muffin batter into prepared muffin tin. Sprinkle tops of muffins with remaining chocolate chips. Bake for 18 minutes.
name: Double Chocolate Muffins
description: Fluffy tall muffins full of chocolate
ingredients: Oil - 1/2 cup, sugar - 1 cup, milk - 1/2 cup, 2 eggs, vanilla extract - 1 tsp, sour cream - 2/3 cup, flour - 2 cups, cocoa powder - 1/2 cup, baking soda - 1 1/2 tsp, salt - 1/2 tsp, semisweet chocolate chips - 2 cups

instructions: Select a pie pan, preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix crumbs, sugar, butter, and salt. Press the crumbs into the bottom of the pan. Mix cheese, sugar, eggs and vanilla, and add into the pan. Bake for 30 minutes.
name: Classic Cheesecake
ingredients: Graham cracker crumbs - 1 1/2 cups, confectioners' sugar - 1/4 cup, melted butter - 1/3 cup, salt - 1/8 tsp, cream cheese - 2 cups, 2 large eggs, sugar - 2/3 cup, vanilla extract - 1 tsp.
